title: Physics
text: Department of Physics, located in the main building

title: Courses Offered
text: Earlier the department used to offer MSc integrated course but along with other department of sciences it switched its MSc int. to BS course and syllabus changed significantly after the change was brought.

title: Autumn Semester - 2nd Year BS
text:
• Electromagnetism - I PH21001: Electrodynamics-I
• Classical Mechanics and General Relativity PH20007: Classical Mechanics-I
• Probability and Statistics MA20104: Probability And Statistics
• Basic Electronics
• Electromagnetism Laboratory
• General Properties of Matter Laboratory
• Basic Electronics Laboratory

title: Spring Semester - 2nd Year BS
text:
• Mathematics for Physics - I
• Thermal Physics
• Quantum Physics
• Optics
• HSS Breath
• Thermal Physics Laboratory
• Optics Laboratory
